item.title: Pre-BarCamp Dinner
item.description: Pat Phelan and Alexia Golez are organizing a pre-Barcamp Cork dinner and they would love you to come along. It’s on in Bangkok93 (A Taste Of Thailand) on Friday 31st of October at 8pm. Numbers are limited to 25 so please leave your name over in his blog comments to confirm you are coming. Budget for around â‚¬25 a head.
